actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to establish a priority for the furnishing of outpatient medical treatment to veterans with service-connected disabilities.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to establish a priority for the furnishing of outpatient medical treatment to veterans with service-connected disabilities. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 621).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to establish a priority for the furnishing of outpatient medical treatment to veterans with service-connected disabilities.
